entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
